components.description: A battery with a minimal amount of power remaining, indicated by the color red. Used to show low power or energy and the need to be plugged in or recharged.
components.title: Low Battery

description: A battery with a minimal amount of power remaining, indicated by the color red. Used to show low power or energy and the need to be plugged in or recharged.
title: Low Battery

version.description:
Unicode 14.0 is the version of the Unicode Standard released on September 14, 2021. 37 new emoji code points were added in this release, with all 112 new emojis (including sequences for skin tones) listed under Emoji 14.0.

New emojis added in this release are update expected to come to major platforms in either late 2021 or early 2022.

This release of this Unicode Standard was delayed from March 2021 due to COVID-19. 

  • üìù Unicode 14.0 details on Unicode.org

apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the low battery emoji is a stark visual indicator of dwindling power, rendered with Apple's clean, minimalist aesthetic. It typically shows a battery icon with a red or orange fill to signify its depleted state, its smooth, rounded edges giving it a modern and accessible feel. This universally understood symbol is used to communicate a need for charging or a potential interruption due to lack of power, a common digital status update on Apple devices.
